laboratory_examinations.findings: Asymmetric wall thickening of a segment of the proximal sigmoid colon with a mass-like appearance and significant surrounding fat stranding. No bowel obstruction is seen. No small bowel thickening. The terminal ileum is normal. No evidence of diverticulosis.

laboratory_examinations.procedure_name: Nonspecific elevation of levels of transaminase or lactic acid dehydrogenase [LDH]
